Articles.Content:
A somewhat stylized F-15 recreation (roughly in scale with the inline cockpit) in what may be a familiar colour scheme.

I'm not sure what it's like to fly an F-15 IRL but this one can be a bit sluggish unless you turn the afterburners on (Action Group 1). I used parachutes to make the back of the under-wing "bombs" taper in the way I wanted, but they also happen to double as pretty handy landing chutes!

Pick up the craft file here.
